_comment: Minecraft Java Edition Server Egg for Pterodactyl
name: Minecraft Java
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: Minecraft Java Edition server with configurable memory and Java version support.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Minecraft Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${SERVER_JARFILE}" == "server.jar" ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading ${MINECRAFT_VERSION} server jar"
    
    if [ "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq .latest.release | sed 's/"//g')
    else
        DOWNLOAD_URL=${MINECRAFT_VERSION}
    fi
    
    VERSION_DATA=$(curl -sSL https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq --arg VERSION "$DOWNLOAD_URL" '.versions[] | select(.id==$VERSION)')
    VERSION_URL=$(echo $VERSION_DATA | jq .url | sed 's/"//g')
    SERVER_URL=$(curl -sSL $VERSION_URL | jq .downloads.server.url | sed 's/"//g')
    
    curl -sSL $SERVER_URL -o server.jar
else
    echo -e "Using custom jar: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
fi

echo -e "\nInstallation completed"

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: The version of Minecraft to download. Use 'latest' for the latest release.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: The maximum amount of memory to use for the Minecraft server.
